root.name: Little Shop: World Traveler
root.description: OverviewÂ Little Shop: World Traveler is a hidden object game originally developed and published by GameHouse for the PC and Mac. Little Shop: World Traveler was later ported to various other platforms such as: iPhone, Android, and Blackberry.
